explains: n. 基石，支柱，基础；隅石，墙角石

sentences.en: Research is the cornerstone of the profession.
This study is the cornerstone of the whole research programme.
sentences.cn: 此项研究是整个研究计划的基础。

sentences.en: The doctrine of surplus value is the cornerstone of Marx's economic theory.
sentences.cn: 剩余价值学说是马克思经济理论的基石。
